plugin.title: Flow
plugin.author: Wesley Luyten
plugin.description: The Flow plugin provides a slick, 3D animation for users to flip through your playlist items. The plugin automatically grabs thumbnail images from any playlist and renders them three-dimensionally in a row. Users can navigate through the playlist by clicking on a thumbnail image or using the left/right arrow keys and space bar to select items.

flashvar.name: coverheight
flashvar.description: This flashvar is used to set the height of the thumbnail images.

flashvar.name: coverwidth
flashvar.description: Maximum width of the cover.

flashvar.name: showtext
flashvar.description: This flashvar is used to indicate if title and description text should appear under the thumbnail images.

flashvar.name: position
flashvar.description: This flashvar is used to indicate the position of the plugin. If left blank, it will appear over the display area. (bottom | left | right | top)

flashvar.name: size
flashvar.description: This flashvar is used to specify the height of the plugin if it is being positioning to the top, bottom, left or right of the display area. If the position flashvar isn't set, then size is ignored.

flashvar.name: defaultcover
flashvar.description: Default image if no thumbnail is available.

flashvar.name: xposition
flashvar.description: Horizontal position of the plugin.

flashvar.name: yposition
flashvar.description: Vertical Position of the plugin

flashvar.name: covergap
flashvar.description: Horizontal width between covers.

flashvar.name: coverangle
flashvar.description: Angle of not selected covers in degrees.

flashvar.name: coverdepth
flashvar.description: Depth of not selected covers.

flashvar.name: coveroffset
flashvar.description: Horizontal width between selected cover and not selected covers.

flashvar.name: opacitydecrease
flashvar.description: Decrease of opacity of the covers going back (min:0, max:1).

flashvar.name: showreflection
flashvar.description: Show a reflection of the cover (true or false).

flashvar.name: reflectionoffset
flashvar.description: Vertical offset of reflection.

flashvar.name: titleoffset
flashvar.description: Vertical offset of title.

flashvar.name: descriptionoffset
flashvar.description: Vertical offset of description.

flashvar.name: font
flashvar.description: Font of title and description.

flashvar.name: fontsize
flashvar.description: Size of font.

flashvar.name: color
flashvar.description: Color of font.

flashvar.name: tweentime
flashvar.description: Elapsed time of one tween animation.

flashvar.name: framerate
flashvar.description: Frame rate of plugin.

flashvar.name: autorotate
flashvar.description: Set this true to auto rotate the covers (true | false).

flashvar.name: rotatedelay
flashvar.description: Delay in milliseconds when auto rotated.

flashvar.name: controlbaricon
flashvar.description: Show a button in the control bar (true | false).

flashvar.name: onidle
flashvar.description: Show or hide plugin when player is idle (show | hide).

flashvar.name: onpaused
flashvar.description: Show or hide plugin when player is paused (show | hide).

flashvar.name: onplaying
flashvar.description: Show or hide plugin when player is playing (show | hide).

flashvar.name: oncompleted
flashvar.description: Show or hide plugin when player is completed (show | hide).

flashvar.name: file
flashvar.description: Delay in milliseconds when auto rotated.
